title: My name is Julian Soro
description: I am a full-stack web developer. I have experience with several back-end scripting languges, including Python, PHP and Ruby. My strength is creating RESTful API services using MVC frameworks, including Django, Laravel, and Rails, which asynchronously populate front-end applications. On the front-end, I am using Angular.JS heavily, however, I also work with React.js. Please contact me if you have a request regarding these or other technologies.
